thread.title: BRIEF-Cardlytics Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share of $1.26

title: BRIEF-Cardlytics Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share of $1.26
text: March 19, 2018 / 9:13 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Cardlytics Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share of $1.26 Reuters Staff   Cardlytics Inc: * CARDLYTICS ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.26 * Q4 REVENUE $39.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $38.6 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.56 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 * FI MAUS WERE 58.7 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2017, AN INCREASE OF 24% * ARPU WAS $0.66 IN Q4 OF 2017 COMPARED TO $0.67 IN Q4 OF 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
